steps.plaintext: Find Aranakin (if Risen Moon Chapter was completed first)
steps.markdown: Find ◀Aranakin▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Aranakin▷ (if Risen Moon Chapter was completed first)

steps.plaintext: Use the Kusava to open up the path
steps.markdown: Use the ◀Kusava▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/%22Kusava%22▷ to open up the path

steps.plaintext: Lower the water level in the cave
steps.markdown: Lower the water level in the cave

steps.plaintext: Go to the exit of the cave
steps.markdown: Go to the exit of the cave

steps.plaintext: Use the Kusava to open up the path
steps.markdown: Use the Kusava to open up the path

steps.plaintext: Go to the cave where the Zohrah Mushroom is located
steps.markdown: Go to the cave where the ◀Zohrah Mushroom▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Zohrah_Mushroom▷ is located

steps.plaintext: Talk to the people who are blocking the cave
steps.markdown: Talk to the people who are blocking the cave

steps.plaintext: Go into the cave where the Zohrah Mushroom is located
steps.markdown: Go into the cave where the Zohrah Mushroom is located

steps.plaintext: Lower the water level in the cave
steps.markdown: Lower the water level in the cave

steps.plaintext: Drain the water and obtain the Zohrah Mushroom
steps.markdown: Drain the water and obtain the Zohrah Mushroom

steps.plaintext: Use the Kusava to break the seal on the Zohrah Mushroom (0/3)
steps.markdown: Use the Kusava to break the seal on the Zohrah Mushroom (0/3)

substeps.plaintext: The three seals are in the north of the quest area. Use the nearby Dendrogranum to destroy the wall with a Charged Attack.
substeps.markdown: The three seals are in the north of the quest area. Use the nearby ◀Dendrogranum▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dendrogranum▷ to destroy the wall with a ◀Charged Attack▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Charged_Attack▷.

steps.plaintext: Get the Zohrah Mushroom back from Lunja
steps.markdown: Get the Zohrah Mushroom back from Lunja

substeps.plaintext: You can choose to negotiate or fight the Eremites. Skip the next step if you negotiate with them.
substeps.markdown: You can choose to negotiate or fight the Eremites. Skip the next step if you negotiate with them.
